org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors

Interface Reactor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommonReactor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockingReactor, IsolationReactor, NonBlockingReactor, ReactorBase, SwingBoundReactor, ThreadBoundReactor, UnboundReactor

    public interface Reactor
extends java.lang.Runnable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    The Reactor interface identifies the processing methods that can be used by applications.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getFacility

        Facility getFacility()
        Returns the facility.
        Returns:
        The facility.

      • setExceptionHandler

        ExceptionHandler setExceptionHandler(ExceptionHandler exceptionHandler)
        Replace the current ExceptionHandler with another.

        When an event or request message is processed by a targetReactor, the current exception handler is set to null. When a request is sent by a targetReactor, the current exception handler is saved in the outgoing message and restored when the response message is processed.

        Parameters:
        exceptionHandler - The exception handler to be used now. May be null if the default exception handler is to be used.
        Returns:
        The exception handler that was previously in effect, or null if the default exception handler was in effect.

      • isInboxEmpty

        boolean isInboxEmpty()
        Returns true when there are no more messages in the inbox. This method is generally only called by a processing's onIdle task to determine when to return so that an incoming message can be processed.
        Returns:
        True when the inbox is empty.

      • run

        void run()
        Processes the messages in the inbox. For a thread-bound processing this method must be called by the thread it is bound to, while for non-blocking and isolation reactors this method is called by ThreadManager.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • addAutoClosableSReq

        SyncRequest<java.lang.Boolean> addAutoClosableSReq(java.lang.AutoCloseable _closeable)
        Returns a request to add an auto closeable, to be closed when the Facility closes. This request returns true if the AutoClosable was added.
        Parameters:
        _closeable - The autoclosable to be added to the list.
        Returns:
        The request.

      • removeAutoClosableSReq

        SyncRequest<java.lang.Boolean> removeAutoClosableSReq(java.lang.AutoCloseable _closeable)
        Returns a request to remove an auto closeable. This request returns true if the AutoClosable was removed.
        Parameters:
        _closeable - The autoclosable to be removed.
        Returns:
        The request.

      • isClosing

        boolean isClosing()
        Returns true if close() has been called already. Can be called from anywhere.
        Returns:
        true if close() has already been called.

      • closeSReq

        SyncRequest<java.lang.Void> closeSReq()
        Returns a Request to perform a close().
